APP.TOAST_MSG_NO_INTERNET: The page could not be loaded. Please check your internet connection.
APP.TOAST_MSG_UNKNOWN_ERROR: The page could not be loaded. An unknown error appeared.
APP.CONFIRM_LOGOUT_TITLE: Are you sure you want to log out?
APP.CONFIRM_LOGOUT_MSG: If you unsubscribe, you will receive no further notifications from PIA. If you only want to stop receiving notifications, you can do so in the notification settings of your device.

LOGIN.TOAST_MSG_ONLY_PROBANDS_ALLOWED: PIA can only be used by participants!
LOGIN.TOAST_MSG_LOGIN_USERNAME_EMPTY_ERROR: Your registration without user name has expired.
LOGIN.TOAST_MSG_LOGIN_PASSWORD_TRIES_ERROR: You entered your password incorrectly 3 times and therefore were temporarily blocked. Left:
LOGIN.TOAST_MSG_LOGIN_NO_USER_EXISTS: The user does not exist or no user name was specified.
LOGIN.TOAST_MSG_LOGIN_NO_BACKEND_MAPPING_EXIST: Backend mapping does not exist for this user.
LOGIN.TOAST_MSG_NEW_PASSWORD_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to request a new password via e-mail?
LOGIN.TOAST_MSG_NEW_PASSWORD_RESULT: In case you entered a valid user name and the user has a known mail address, an e-mail with a new password was successfully delivered.
LOGIN.GIVEN_BACKEND_URL_NOT_VALID: The specified backend URL is invalid
LOGIN.ALERT_MSG_INCOMPATIBLE_APP_VERSION: Sie verwenden eine veraltete App Version. Bitte stellen Sie sicher, dass Sie die aktuellste Version aus dem Store installieren und nutzen.

CHANGE_PASSWORD.TITLE: Change password
CHANGE_PASSWORD.DESELECT_PASSWORD_HINT2: By deselecting the password, anyone who knows your pseudonym will be able to access your PIA data from any device.
CHANGE_PASSWORD.DESELECT_PASSWORD_HINT1:
1. must contain at least one of the following special characters: #, $, @, !, %, &, +, *, ?, :, ;, <, =, >, _, |, /, ~, (, ), -, {{'{'}}, {{'}'}}
2. must contain at least one capital letter
3. must contain at least one lower case letter
4. must contain at least one digit
5. must be at least {{len}} characters long
CHANGE_PASSWORD.TOAST_MSG_PASSWORD_LENGTH_ERROR: Password must be at least {{len}} characters long.

COMPLIANCE.TITLE: Consent
COMPLIANCE.MSG_COMPLIANCE_FILLED_BY_RESEARCH_TEAM: For this study, there is neither a consent form that has already been filled out, nor one that needs to be filled out here.
COMPLIANCE.MSG_APP_COMPLIANCE_NEEDED: The approval of the App is required.
COMPLIANCE.TOAST_MSG_SUCCESSFULLY_SENT: Your consent configuration was successfully saved.

QUESTIONNAIRE_QUESTIONS.NUMERIC_INPUT_MSG_MUST_FULL_NUMBER: The value must be a whole number
QUESTIONNAIRE_QUESTIONS.DATE_INPUT_MSG1: Please enter a date between {{restriction_min}} and {{restriction_max}}.
QUESTIONNAIRE_QUESTIONS.SAMPLE_INPUT_MSG_PROBES_NO_MATCH: Sample IDs do not match each other.
QUESTIONNAIRE_QUESTIONS.SAMPLE_INPUT_MSG_PROBE_ALREADY_SCANNED: A sample with this ID has unfortunately already been scanned.
QUESTIONNAIRE_QUESTIONS.SAMPLE_INPUT_MSG_PROBE_EXISTS: The sample ID must have the following format:
QUESTIONNAIRE_QUESTIONS.SAMPLE_INPUT_MSG_DOESNT_EXIST: A sample with this ID does not exist in the system.
QUESTIONNAIRE_QUESTIONS.SAMPLE_INPUT_MSG_PROBE_FORMAT: The sample ID must have the following format:
QUESTIONNAIRE_QUESTIONS.SAMPLE_INPUT_MSG_PROBE_ALREADY_IN_SYSTEM: A sample with this ID does not exist in the system.
QUESTIONNAIRE_QUESTIONS.TOAST_MSG2: Your answers could not be saved. Please check your internet connection.
QUESTIONNAIRE_QUESTIONS.ALERT_SUBTITLE_ANSWER_CURRENT_QUESTION: Please answer the current question first
QUESTIONNAIRE_QUESTIONS.ALERT_SUBTITLE_ANSWERS_SENT: Your answers have now been sent.
QUESTIONNAIRE_QUESTIONS.ALERT_SUBTITLE_SENT_LAST_TIME: Your answers have now been sent for the last time.
QUESTIONNAIRE_QUESTIONS.UPLOADED_IMAGE_TOO_LARGE: Only files up to 20MB in size can be uploaded. Please check your file size.
